{"lineNumber":85264,"originalJapaneseLine":"残された戦いなどただの事後処理。","translatedEnglishLine":"The battles remaining were just mere cleanup."},

{"lineNumber":85265,"originalJapaneseLine":"後は破壊と略奪だけすればいい分、","translatedEnglishLine":"All that was left was destruction and looting,"},

{"lineNumber":85266,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の兵達は晴れやかな活気に溢れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the demon soldiers were filled with cheerful energy."},

{"lineNumber":85267,"originalJapaneseLine":"一方――","translatedEnglishLine":"On the other hand—"},

{"lineNumber":85268,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPAN、モロッコ――","translatedEnglishLine":"JAPAN, Morocco—"},

{"lineNumber":85269,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍に対抗するように天満橋の","translatedEnglishLine":"Opposing the demon army, on Tenmabashi's"},

{"lineNumber":85270,"originalJapaneseLine":"反対側にはJAPAN軍三万が展開していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"opposite side, 30,000 JAPAN troops were deployed."},

{"lineNumber":85271,"originalJapaneseLine":"その前線にJAPAN軍がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the front lines were the JAPAN troops."},

{"lineNumber":85272,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".............\""},

{"lineNumber":85273,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗が橋の向こうを、","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune stared across the bridge,"},

{"lineNumber":85274,"originalJapaneseLine":"その大きな一つ目で睨む。","translatedEnglishLine":"glowering with his large single eye."},

{"lineNumber":85275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怖い顔をしておるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have a scary face.\""},{"lineNumber":85276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お町」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-machi.\""},{"lineNumber":85277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前のそのような顔、あの頃以来か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That kind of expression on your face… is it since that time...?\""},{"lineNumber":85278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh…\""},{"lineNumber":85279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それも仕方ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":85280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPAN軍の主力はほぼ全て、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Almost all of the JAPAN army's main force,"},{"lineNumber":85281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　香姫様が連れて行きました……","translatedEnglishLine":"Princess Kaori took with her..."},{"lineNumber":85282,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今の野菊達の戦力じゃ……","translatedEnglishLine":"With the current forces of Nogiku and the others..."},{"lineNumber":85283,"originalJapaneseLine":"防衛に割り当てられた妖怪軍、","translatedEnglishLine":"The youkai army assigned to defense,"},{"lineNumber":85284,"originalJapaneseLine":"筆頭独眼流政宗、そして政宗の嫁達が、","translatedEnglishLine":"led by the one-eyed Masamune, and Masamune's wives,"},{"lineNumber":85285,"originalJapaneseLine":"JAPAN軍の前線に立っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stood on the front lines of the JAPAN army."},

{"lineNumber":85286,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、ここは我らの国」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this is our country.\""},{"lineNumber":85287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこに攻め入ろうとする不届き者、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those audacious enough to try to invade here,"},{"lineNumber":85288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どのように仕置きするか考えていた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking how to punish them.\""},{"lineNumber":85289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".............\""},

{"lineNumber":85290,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗らしからぬ軽口に、","translatedEnglishLine":"For a light remark uncharacteristic of Masamune,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに関係する一部のスキルは使えません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Some of the skills related to that cannot be used."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「４：勝てなくても無理せず気楽に楽しみましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "4: Even if you can't win, don't push yourself and enjoy it casually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本編で修行してから再挑戦もいいですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's also good to train in the main story and then try again."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クエスト達成おめでとうございまーす♪
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Congratulations on completing the quest♪

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パチパチー♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Clap clap*♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん、意外とやるんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, you're surprisingly good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この調子で頑張りなさいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Keep it up at this pace."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANと大陸を繋ぐ唯一の巨大な橋、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only huge bridge connecting JAPAN and the mainland,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天満橋。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tenmabashi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、ここが戦場になろうとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, this place was about to become a battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸、ポルトガル――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mainland, Portugal—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に自由都市を占領した魔物大将軍ピサロ率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general Pizarro, who had already occupied the free city,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍がポルトガル付近の野営地に集結していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was gathering at an encampment near Portugal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「天満橋の様子はどうだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How is the situation at Tenmabashi?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、準備は着々と進んでおります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, preparations are steadily progressing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またこのポルトガルにも自由都市中から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, soldiers are being gathered here in Portugal from all free cities,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵を集め、現在の総数は十万に」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the current total number has reached one hundred thousand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「順調。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Smooth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はははっ、怖いくらいに全ては順調だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha, everything is progressing so well it's almost scary."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……この手柄は誰にも渡さん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I won't let anyone else take this glory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANは俺のものにしてやるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will make JAPAN mine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、準備を急がせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, hasten the preparations."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残された戦いなどただの事後処理。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battles remaining were just mere cleanup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は破壊と略奪だけすればいい分、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All that was left was destruction and looting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の兵達は晴れやかな活気に溢れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the demon soldiers were filled with cheerful energy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一方――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the other hand—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN、モロッコ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: JAPAN, Morocco—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に対抗するように天満橋の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Opposing the demon army, on Tenmabashi's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反対側にはJAPAN軍三万が展開していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opposite side, 30,000 JAPAN troops were deployed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その前線にJAPAN軍がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the front lines were the JAPAN troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗が橋の向こうを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune stared across the bridge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その大きな一つ目で睨む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: glowering with his large single eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「怖い顔をしておるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have a scary face."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お町」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-machi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前のそのような顔、あの頃以来か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of expression on your face… is it since that time...?"
"Huh…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも仕方ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPAN軍の主力はほぼ全て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Almost all of the JAPAN army's main force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫様が連れて行きました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Kaori took with her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の野菊達の戦力じゃ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the current forces of Nogiku and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛に割り当てられた妖怪軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The youkai army assigned to defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筆頭独眼流政宗、そして政宗の嫁達が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: led by the one-eyed Masamune, and Masamune's wives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN軍の前線に立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood on the front lines of the JAPAN army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ここは我らの国」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is our country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに攻め入ろうとする不届き者、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those audacious enough to try to invade here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのように仕置きするか考えていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking how to punish them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗らしからぬ軽口に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a light remark uncharacteristic of Masamune,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That kind of expression on your face… is it since that time...?"
"Huh…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも仕方ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That can't be helped."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPAN軍の主力はほぼ全て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Almost all of the JAPAN army's main force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫様が連れて行きました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Kaori took with her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の野菊達の戦力じゃ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the current forces of Nogiku and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防衛に割り当てられた妖怪軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The youkai army assigned to defense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 筆頭独眼流政宗、そして政宗の嫁達が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: led by the one-eyed Masamune, and Masamune's wives,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPAN軍の前線に立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stood on the front lines of the JAPAN army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ここは我らの国」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is our country."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこに攻め入ろうとする不届き者、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Those audacious enough to try to invade here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのように仕置きするか考えていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking how to punish them."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗らしからぬ軽口に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a light remark uncharacteristic of Masamune,
